ListPreference.android:title: Pressure filtering
ListPreference.android:summary: The time taken for the filter to settle

ListPreference.android:title: Sampling rate
ListPreference.android:summary: Faster is more accurate but uses more power

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show VSI
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Altimeter will be larger and VSI will not be shown
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Vertical speed indicator will be shown

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show Status Info
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Status information will replace navigation warning

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use metric units for pressure setting
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Inches of mercury (inHg) are in use
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Hectopascals (hPa, equivalent to millibars) are in use

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Display in feet
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Altimeter and VSI display in feet
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Altimeter and VSI display in metres

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Display altitude history
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: 30s of altitude history are displayed on a rolling graph
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: The altitude history graph is not displayed

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Display vertical speed history
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: 30s of vertical speed history are displayed on a rolling graph
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: The vertical history graph is not displayed
